fullText: husband birthday mainly purpose listening digital audio books wasted hours trying download audio files trying play properly files simply stop playing finally unit freezing completely samsung k3 2 gb slim portable media player am happy downloading files quick easy recharging easy playback whatever dont buy mp3 player
